title: 2026 will clarify Europeâ€™s new priorities for space
summary: The article discusses Europe's evolving priorities in space for 2026, including launcher competitions, defense budgets, exploration commitments, and key industry players like ICEYE, D-Orbit, and Eutelsat. ICEYE is mentioned as pivoting toward defense and military markets but no concrete deal is described.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: mentioned as pivoting toward defense/military markets

entities.name: D-Orbit
entities.involvement: mentioned for 2024 Series C funding and acquisition of Planetek
